mapper.select: SELECT A.*, B.demand_name FROM workload A LEFT JOIN demand B ON A.demand_id = B.demand_id WHERE A.user_id = #{userId} AND A.work_date = #{searchTime}

SELECT A.full_name AS fullName, C.demand_name AS demandName, B.work_content AS workContent, B.work_time AS workTime, C.is_create AS isCreate FROM account A LEFT JOIN workload B ON A.user_id = B.user_id LEFT JOIN demand C ON B.demand_id = C.demand_id WHERE B.work_date = #{searchTime} AND A.department_id = #{departmentId} ORDER BY A.full_name

SELECT A.full_name AS fullName, C.demand_name AS demandName, SUM( B.work_time) AS workTime, C.is_create as isCreate FROM account A LEFT JOIN workload B ON A.user_id = B.user_id LEFT JOIN demand C ON B.demand_id = C.demand_id WHERE A.department_id = #{departmentId} AND B.work_date BETWEEN #{beginTime} AND #{endTime} GROUP BY B.demand_id,B.user_id
